skill.name: agent.skills.Follow
skill.description:
For the agent, to follow a set of other agents (a company, friends, enemies, crowds). This skill uses the "stayClose" skill. Il means that the agent will follow the nearest agent among those issued. If one of the agents is not operational, the agent won't follow it, even if it is the nearest.
If no entities can be followed (none of them are operational), this skill sends the feedback 'failed'.

parameter.name: entities
parameter.description: The set of entities to follow.
